author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body: Can you add some compatibility constarints? At least on Julia, see https://julialang.github.io/Pkg.jl/v1/compatibility/
You also need to retrigger the bot in order to update this PR.

I've created release `v0.1.0`, [here](https://github.com/OpenLibMathSeq/IntegerSequences.jl/releases/tag/v0.1.0) it is.
<!-- c376ab70-6bf3-11e9-941f-dea1c7313be0 -->
